title: Not everyone in the League community is toxic...
body:
I woke up this morning and logged into my main smurf account (still leveling it; it'll be used to play with my Bronze/Silver friends), and a pop-up appeared in the center of the client. I had been mystery gifted Amethyst Ashe by a guy named Regulador. The message that went with the gifted skin said "well played". He had also sent me a friend request.

At first I didn't know who this was, so I checked my match history to see if I'd played with this guy before. Turned out that we were in bot lane together, and I was supporting his Twitch as Annie. This confused me, because I didn't even do well that game (I went 4/9/11, and I occasionally took one of his creeps to get the stun stack). But I guess I must've done something right to deserve a random skin.

I plan on adding this guy on my main account and play a few games with him at the very least.

TL; DR: Played a game with a guy named Regulador yesterday, he thought I did well and mystery gifted me a skin for no reason after the game.
